import React, { Component } from 'react'; import styles from "./custom.module.css" ; import axios from 'axios'; class Contacts extends Component { state = { isclicked : false, issearch :false, username: '', contacts: [], } handleSubmit = e => { this.setState({isclicked: true}); e.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state.username.length); if(this.state.username.length!=0){ const url = "http://localhost:80/react-backend/searchContact.php"; axios.get(url,{ params: { username: this.state.username } }).then(response => response.data) .then((data) => { this.setState({ contacts: data }) console.log(this.state.contacts) }) } else{ const url = "http://localhost:80/react-backend/getContacts.php"; axios.get(url,{ params: { username: this.state.username } }).then(response => response.data) .then((data) => { this.setState({ contacts: data }) console.log(this.state.contacts) }) } } render() { if(!this.state.isclicked && !this.state.issearch){ return (

CONTACTS



this.setState({ username: e.target.value })} />
